ygData.subject: Re: Magicians and Wizards (irritation)
ygData.msgSnippet: Responding to magician/wizard comparison, there may be some spoiler information contained within of damage and casting times of mid-level spells. . . Hm, I
ygData.messageBody:
Responding to magician/wizard comparison, there may be some spoiler
information contained within of damage and casting times of mid-level
spells.

.
.

Hm, I hear the magician blast spell at lvl 16 does about 80-95 pts of
damage. I guess I don't see why your using flame shock (102 damage at
lvl
16). I use the Lightning Bolt ( 117 damage at lvl 16 ) which uses only
10
more mana. So you have to aim, I usually tell my group not to fidget
when
fighting :P Or just circle stafe the melee for a good position.

The actual damage/mana ratio is the same, ours just does more per blast.
According to eq stratics the base casting time for magician blast spell
at
16 is 3 seconds. Ours is 2 seconds. If this is true then that is an
advantage on our part.

Ziffnab MageStorm wrote:

> From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
>
> During my adventures over the past weekend I happened to group with a
> very nice magician and his pet "Gonaker." We did very well together
> and had fun.
>
> The problem was that he made claims that he can strike a target for DD
> equal to mine. We were both level 19 and sad thing is, I think he is
> right! Can anyone tell me how much mana is used and damage delivered
> for the magician DD spell (16th level) equivelant to Fire Shock? I
> have a feeling it will be the same which is sad really.
>
> Before I rant on my class I will need to know the truth on this matter.
> I love being a wizard and believe the long road to true power is a
> long one. But we should be doing more damage than a damn magician and
> plus he gets a pet. Let me know.
>
> Thanks!
>
> - Ziffnab of Xegony
>
